presents the structure characteristics and working principle of type 28 gas seal and summarizes the dismantling and reassembling gists as well as operation and maintenance experiences .介绍28型气体密封的结构特点、工作原理，总结拆卸与装配要领，操作与维修经验。

entry.tran: 重组；重新整合；重新装配
entry.def: If you reassemble something, you put it back together after it has been taken apart.

example.ex: We will now try to reassemble pieces of the wreckage...
example.tran: 我们现在会尽量把残骸重新组合起来。

example.ex: The table had to be taken apart and hoisted through the window before it was reassembled.
example.tran: 桌子得被拆开，通过窗户吊进来，然后再重新组装。

entry.def: If a group of people reassembles or if you reassemble them, they gather together again in a group.

example.ex: We shall reassemble in the car park in thirty minutes...
example.tran: 我们30分钟后在停车场再碰面。

example.ex: Mr Lucas reassembled his team in September.
example.tran: 卢卡斯先生在9月重新召集了他的队伍。

means.word_mean: 1. assemble once again, after taking something apart
